Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Stam Wagemakers Kuipers at a corporate retreat in Amsterdam. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
With a career spanning nearly 17 years, Stam Wagemakers Kuipers has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Stam Wagemakers Kuipers is currently divorced. His children are named Ilona, Stam and Willems.
Education Background:
Stam graduated from Hoeksch Lyceum Rotterdam in 2003.
Stam completed his university education at Tio University of Applied Sciences in 2006.
Occupation History:
Stam Wagemakers Kuipers is a seasoned professional with over 17 years of experience.
Stam Wagemakers Kuipers's first role was as a Assistant Designer at Victor & Rolf B.V., where he worked diligently from 2008 to 2009 to establish a strong reputation.
He then transitioned to Victor & Rolf B.V. as a Senior Designer, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2009 to 2025.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 200000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has villa located in Delft, worth 2790000 EUR.


Following the passing of his mother, a successful Stock Trader, he received an inheritance of 3700000 EUR in 2005, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
